issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Focusing back and forth between fields does not update the keyboard toolbar. When trying to programmatically set the contents of the toolbar - the toolbar stays stationary on the page when the keyboard is closed (the field is blurred). Tested on 1.5.1, 1.6.

Original Ticket: http://developer.appcelerator.com/helpdesk/view/63561

{html}
fields.summary: iOS Bug - Keyboard Toolbar Oddities on Focus / Blur

comments.body:
{html}

(from [bbca90499aa7caf3393ca91d04f9243428f24e8d]) [#1645 state:fixed-in-qa] [#1714 state:fixed-in-qa] [#2189 state:fixed-in-qa] [#2442 state:fixed-in-qa] [#1645 state:fixed-in-qa milestone:"Release 1.6.0 M05"] [#2736 state:fixed-in-qa milestone:"Release 1.6.0 M05"] [#2746 state:fixed-in-qa milestone:"Release 1.6.0 M05"] [#2197 state:fixed-in-qa milestone:"Release 1.6.0 M05"] [#2746 state:fixed-in-qa milestone:"Release 1.6.0 M05"] Look ma, I fixed the keyboard! https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/bbca90499aa7...

{html}

{html}

Successful iOS Simulator and iOS Device test on 01/25/2011.

*iOS Simulator Results: Toolbar appears and disappears properly

*iPhone Results: Toolbar appears and disappears properly

Mobile SDK version: 1.6.0 (01/25/11 13:33 1f1dd51...)

Device/Version: iPhone 4 / 4.2.1

Simulator Version: 4.2 (235)

{html}
